system.requirements: Reach 2,500xp Spent (or any multiple of 2,500). Optional, can choose to stick with current specialty and gain +5 to any one Characteristic character has an Aptitude in.

description.value:
On the Battlefield the Commander's will be done, they are sure of voice, unyielding in action. They may lead a multitude of Comrades underneath them, who seek to slay the enemies of the Imperium, or assist others in doing so.

Effects: Replace Current Specialty's Aptitudes and Equipment with that of the Commander. Apt: Intelligence, Leadership, Social, Toughness, Weapon Skill Add. Equipment: Best Chainsword or Common Power Sword, Best Laspistol or Good Bolt Pistol, Laud Hailer. Gain Talents: Air of Authority+Combat Formation or Heroic Inspiration. Can Purchase Unique Talent: Born Leader and Sweeping Orders: Back them Up, Dig In, and Flank Them!
